lines.text: The Spiral Zone, as we call it, robs the will. It makes the victim easy to control, mindless. Troops can't go in - victims can't get out!
Our one hope is Commander Dirk Courage and his elite - Zone Riders. Outfitted with our only supply of neutron power suits, that let them enter the Spiral Zone. See for yourselves!
[the monitor shows Commander Courage during combat action]
Commander Dirk Courage - fearless, US special forces, congressional medal of honor, bronze star, purple heart.
There is always a way out of the darkness, no matter how deep it is!
So, the war will go on.
Yes, until we finally win. And we will win!
As long as one Zone Rider is left, it is not over yet.
I am going to win this war, Courage! Do you believe that?
